author: Activist
text: As people can mostly hire their friends and families without being anxious of any consequences. The principals have power over the sgb's. Infact our sgb's especially in black schools is clueless about their mandate. They hardly deal or resolve any issue.

author: Activist
text:
Assist on other side to produce entrepreneurs and artists who would create for themselves jobs and others.
So this issue of qualified teachers teaching in fields they are not qualified for is a serious problem and it has worsened nepotiam and corruption at school level.

text:
